title: OCE Ranked Queue times have gone to shit the last week or so. Why?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I've noticed that queue times are getting longer and longer. Why is that? Is LoL dying on OCE? Anyone else noticed significantly longer queue times? Specifically in Bronze Silver and Gold?

replies.body:
I think it's because they amped up the probability of you getting your primary role. It went live just after the patch on NA, I think it took a little while to get here though.

Just speculation.
Sounds like it might be it. When did that change come through?
I don't know for sure. The adjustments to the back end match making don't require a patch so there's no real way to tell without having someone from Riot let you know.
Yeah cos league has turned to shit and overwatch is just a better game :)

How can overwatch be better than league? There is no diversity, every game is filled to the brim with: Reaper (Zed), Hanzo (Yasuo), Genji (Master Yi), Widowmaker (Caitlin), and Bastion (Blitzcrank)..... oh wait thats league too...

But still i dont think Overwatch _replaces_ League, it looks pretty damn different to me, its basically CoD with League champs. Not a better version of League.
Bastion is more of a Kog blitz bybrid

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Px0n09eR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-12T21:52:01.475+0000)

im saying that they actually know how to run a game, riot has no clue what they are doing and never have.

Here's the next game...

https://gyazo.com/5069a881404f260de0596d6192e89bc2

11 mins for an estimated 3 min queue?
Don't worry mate I'm currently sitting at 23 minutes S4.... this is an actual joke. Also my queue popped at 5mins and someone dodged, am now up to 23 minutes.

I've noticed the same damn thing - often 10-20 min queue times in silver. It's actually out of hand. If riot did change something to give you primary role more often, its not good because its increasing the wait time too much.
Also the fact that people have exams around this time of year. Mid years suck.
